name: Portland Stained Glass Rose
description:
This vibrant stained glass rose comes from Portland hand painted, copper foiled, and finished with a patina.  As delicate as a rose might be this rose is strong, reinforced with copper wire that embosses the edges of the glass and forms the loop for hanging. The stain is fired on and all glass has been properly annealed. This is our smaller rose and is 8.5" wide. 
The actual rose pictured may not be available but can be made to order. As each rose is handpainted individually, differences may occur.
Shipping of this item will be insured.

name: Owl
description:
This wise owl is handpainted and fired, fusing the stain to the glass. We use Reusche stains and complete the panel with lead came that is cemented and polished to sparkle. The panel itself is 9"x12" and comes framed in a 13"x16" ebony stained frame complete with sidehooks for hanging.
The actual owl pictured may not be available but can be made to order. We also have different versions of our lone owl, a windy sky as well as a night owl. If you would like to see a different version let us know upon ordering.
Shipping of this item will be insured.
